content.body: If by "module maps" you mean a `referrer+specifier -> evaluatedModule` map probably yes, but it's populated lazily when modules are evaluated for the first time

content.body: For the july 6 meeting -- can folks think about what their goals are with the module loader api? What capabilities do you want to enable? I will be touching on that, so that we can have a picture as to what problems we are looking to solve.
